snippet: Mr. Cook, the executive editor of Gawker Media, describes the company’s plans to refashion Gawker.com into a politics website.

byline.original: Compiled by THE NEW YORK TIMES

lead_paragraph: Mr. Cook, the executive editor of Gawker Media, describes the company’s plans to refashion Gawker.com into a politics website.

headline.main: John Cook’s Memo to Gawker’s Staff
